>
[Gliding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1831)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 12 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 450 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The armor allows you to make a controlled descent.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))    **Effect** You glide slowly toward the ground, 5 feet down and up to 25 feet forward through the air. Provided you spend at least 1 action gliding on your turn and haven't yet reached the ground, you remain in the air at the end of your turn. Otherwise, you fall.
